examples: He sat down on the back of the chair.
I hurt my back lifting that heavy box.
Ele sentou-se no encosto da cadeira.
Machuquei minhas costas levantando aquela caixa pesada.

suggested: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field... out standing in his field of straw, that is. Not his field of... you know, never mind.
Looking back on past mistakes can be painful, but it's necessary for growth.
I can't believe he talked behind my back like that!
The hidden gem of the city was tucked away in the back alley.
The feeling of a warm back massage after a long day.
The connection between a mother and her child is unbreakable, no matter how far apart they may be.
